review: This is a great 2D platformer game for everyone who loves those 2D platformers like Mario. Quite a bit of blood and fustrating levels but theres a range of charaters to unlock. It is a bit over priced, you should wait till its sale but overall its a great game.
The best free, first person shooter, multiplayer game. MUST PLAY!!!!! Plus hundreds of weapons and a variety of classes to choose from.
